remarks:
A class is equal to its successor iff it is a proper class (assuming the Axiom of Regularity).  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jul-2004.)  (Proof shortened by BJ, 16-Apr-2019.) 

---

 A class is equal to its successor iff it is a proper class (assuming the Axiom of Set Induction).  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jul-2004.)
statement: sucprcreg $p |- ( -. A e. _V <-> suc A = A ) $.
